com.epam.training.booklibrary.dao.implementations

Class DAOSearchOrderCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.booklibrary.dao.implementations.DAOSearchOrderCriteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAOSearchCriteria

    public class DAOSearchOrderCriteria
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDAOSearchCriteria
    The class contains methods on preparation of inquiries for a DB in the specified search parameters for work with the list of orders for books

    • Constructor Detail

      • DAOSearchOrderCriteria

        public DAOSearchOrderCriteria(int typeSearch,
                              java.lang.String searchText,
                              int statusOrder,
                              int typeOrder,
                              int recordCountPage,
                              int numberPage)
        Constructor of class
        Parameters:
        typeSearch - int search type (1-on the user's ID, 2-according to the name of the book, 3-on the author of the book)
        searchText - the text for search
        statusOrder - int the status of the order (everything, 1 expectation, 2-in work, 3-closed)
        typeOrder - int order type (0-All, 1-Reading room, 2-On hands)
        recordCountPage - int number of records on the page
        numberPage - int number of the page

                                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                    javax.naming.NamingException
        Method of preparation of parameters of search and creation of inquiry to a DB
        Specified by:
        preparedStatement in interface IDAOSearchCriteria
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection with a DB (type of Connection)
        stmt - Inquiry to a DB (type of PreparedStatement)
        sqlText - the text of inquiry to a DB
        orderBYText - part of inquiry to a DB which is responsible for an order of sorting of data
        Returns:
        the inquiry (type of PreparedStatement) prepared for performance
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
